name: ActyMac
tag_list: mac, macos, monitoring, empoyees, spy, software, parental, control, keylogger, screenshots, keystrokes, application, capture, recording, corporate
overview:
ActyMac is a Software Development Company that specializes in the production and distribution of Mac software and technologies. ActyMac was founded in 2006 as Protection Technology Company for Mac OS since that time has become famous for its software development.

ActyMac production is mainly focused on recording and monitoring applications that meet the requirements of private and corporate users. ActyMac software presents a complex solution for remote monitoring of user’s computer activities. Due to the innovative features we have enabled distant control without physical access to monitored Mac.

The wide functionality and high quality of released products are the main priorities laid into the company’s work. These principles are especially important in the business environment when controling the employees’ activities during the working hours. DutyWatch and DutyWatch Remote worked out by ActyMac work undetectable monitoring the application and keyboard usage. Our developers have also engaged the iSight camera screenshots to enable screenshots control.

Our company recognises the constantly increasing interest to our products and has developed some new programs with new features and expanded functionality of our old well-known products. Since ActyMac products are oriented for the changing demands of our customers, the list of applications offered on our website suggests a monitoring and recording tool for any purposes. Screenshot Remote allows to capture screenshots which is perfect to control the usage of home and business computers. The ability to record all keystrokes typed from the keyboard is released in the KeyBag application â€“ a keylogger that monitors keyboard activity in the stealth mode.

Thus ActyMac company offers a variety of options for those who would like to establish control over activities performed on computer. The users will also appreciate the new feature of remote supervision over computer usage. All products presented on our website are marked with excellent quality and convenience in utilisation. So ActyMac software provides you with high-level control and security without any need to get highly specialized skills and knowledge.
